item.title: Interactive Visualization of Healthcare by Income
item.description:
The code is in this Repository and this is the live demo.

This graph shows how the proportion of healthcare insurance changes overtime on each percentile income group. This is my replication of Quoctrung Bui graph published in New York Times using HTML and D3. This is a homework that …
item.dc:creator: Boni Oloff

item.title: Decline Of Farming Jobs Graph
item.description:
The code is in this Repository and this the live demo.

This graph shows that the proportion of farming job decrease drastically, while other kind of jobs increase. This is my replication of Quoctrung Bui graph published in NPR using HTML and D3. This is a homework that I did …

item.title: Financial Inclusion and Economic Development
item.description:
An exploratory study to learn how micro aspects of financial inclusion play an important role in improving welfare. The analysis using Python with complete code in this repository.

This is a project of me @bonioloff and @harryhendharto for the Data and Programming for Public Policy II - PPHA 30536 class at …
